name: The Only Cure is Death
description:
You are a plague doctor during an exquisite plague that is affecting everyone in the land. People are paniquing and only can help. Some people think killing other innocents is the best way to think about this issue, and others are too contaminated to go back.

Kill these people and save the innocent ones by throwing potions with varied effects.

Programming - FunkyMonk420

Music and sfx's - Aless and Peter

Modelling and Texturing - LERPish

Level Design - Alexa
